title: Refreshing!
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>I feel like everyone has been working a little bit too hard recently.... I’m kind of worried that they’re pushing themselves....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm.... I can understand why someone would have so much fun on school idol activities that they work too hard. But I also understand why you would be worried, Eli-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thank you. But I also don’t want to disregard their efforts<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You’re amazing, Eli-san. If it were me, I think I would simply say “You shouldn’t work too hard”....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Is there any good way, I wonder?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>To not disregard their efforts, huh.... Hmm.... Ah, how about you invite them to go out and eat tasty sweets? No one can resist delicious things~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I see. That may be a good idea.... Then Chika, shall we go out and eat some sweets<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh, me!? Was all of that about me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Of course it’s about the rest of μ’s, but I’m also worried about you, Chika. I heard that you’ve been practicing a considerable amount more. So let’s take a one day break and go sweets hunting with me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eli-san.... I’m so happy! I’m looking forward to our sweets hunt-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
